dcterms:creator: X. Liu
W. Liu
T. Mei
H. Ma
dcterms:description: VeRi776 is captured by 20 cameras in unconstrained traffic scenarios, and each vehicle is captured by 2-18 cameras. It is divided into a training subset containing 37,746 images of 576 subjects and a testing subset including a probe subset of 1,678 images of 200 subjects and a gallery subset of 11,579 images of the same 200 subjects.
dcterms:title: VeRi776

dcterms:creator: H. Liu
Y. Tian
Y. Wang
L. Pang
T. Huang
dcterms:description: VehicleID includes 221,763 images of 26,267 subjects. Each vehicle is captured from either front or rear viewpoint. The training subset consists of 110,178 images of 13,164 subjects, with three testing subsets for evaluating performance at different data scales.
dcterms:title: VehicleID

dcterms:creator: Y. Lou
Y. Bai
J. Liu
S. Wang
L. Duan
dcterms:description: VeRi-Wild is a dataset captured at both day and night, containing 416,314 images of 40,671 subjects. It is divided into a training subset of 277,797 images and a testing subset of 128,517 images, organized into three different scale subsets for evaluation.
dcterms:title: VeRi-Wild
